actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-160.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the printing of additional copies of the "Report of the Special Subcommittee on the Middle East of the Committee on Armed Services, House of Representatives, Committee Paper No. 94-3.

summary.text: Provides for the printing of 1,000 additional copies of the "Report of the Special Subcommittee on the Middle East of the Committee on Armed Services, House of Representatives", Committee Paper Numbered 94-3, for the use of the House Armed Services Committee.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the printing of additional copies of the "Report of the Special Subcommittee on the Middle East of the Committee on Armed Services, House of Representatives, Committee Paper No. 94-3.
